author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text: Good morning baby, big decision day ahead, job and that crap. Sometimes we go from baby steps to enormous leaps we aren’t ready for. Too much of that lately in painful ways but we keep going. Hopefully the spring sunshine will recharge and bring back the faith we need♥️♥️

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text: Sweet dreams baby, doing my best occasionally, getting overwhelmed and then bobbing back to the surface. Fresh flowers and a morbid sense of humor keep me going, a bad example of coping skills but c’est la vie. Your calm keeps me centered, your light tames my fear♥️♥️

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text: I believe in love, in us, just climbing over the wall of pain is just a bit daunting today 💔💔♥️

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text:
The poet talks about making memories 
But not always true
My only memory is love expressed 
A moment ago
It builds into an endless tale 
Of love and chance for soul healing 
So when we’re old, resting 
I’ll think about times past 
But love for you presently 
Is too busy to dwell

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text:
The human has the capacity to forget 
We judge, decide the worth
We cut and paste relationships 
But the One who breaks the rules 
Worth all efforts that never feel like work 
Natural love that flows like a river
Into the ocean our hearts join forever 
Time and tide unaffecting

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text:
My words to you of forever 
Syllables to hope on
Building on the path 
A course of storm and uncertainty 
Polaris unchanging 
Constant and true
Guiding in dark and light 
To safe harbors
Voyages uncharted but never alone
We kept the faith
That brought us safely home

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text:
The sunset girl 
The sunrise boy
Stare at the stars and pray
For the universe’s kindness 
To send love and light their way

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text: Morning baby, vivid dreams all night, being mobile and free, so hoping this time is the charm. We have willing hearts and minds, but the universe has the final say. All we can do is pray to make good decisions and be ready for our chance. Have a great day, love and light ♥️♥️

author: LinneAine♥️🦼✨🌹🌻⛵️🏝🦋
text: Sweet dreams baby, wishing on stars, thinking about healing and believing in happy endings. Hope your path showed promise and reinforced your faith in the future today. Love and light always ♥️♥️
